weeklyMilestones.goal: Learn basic guitar parts and tuning.
Master basic chords and strumming patterns.
Play simple songs using learned chords.
Develop fingerpicking technique and learn a new song.

tasks.title: Guitar Anatomy
tasks.instruction: Learn the parts of the guitar and their functions.

tasks.title: Tuning the Guitar
tasks.instruction: Use a tuner to tune your guitar to standard EADGBE.

tasks.title: Holding the Guitar
tasks.instruction: Practice holding the guitar correctly while sitting and standing.

tasks.title: Basic Finger Placement
tasks.instruction: Learn how to place your fingers on the fretboard.

tasks.title: Open Chords Introduction
tasks.instruction: Learn the E minor and E major chords.

tasks.title: Strumming Basics
tasks.instruction: Practice downstrokes on open strings.

tasks.title: More Open Chords
tasks.instruction: Learn A major and D major chords.

tasks.title: Strumming Patterns
tasks.instruction: Practice a simple down-up strumming pattern.

tasks.title: Chord Transitions
tasks.instruction: Practice switching between E minor, E major, A major, and D major.

tasks.title: Strumming Practice
tasks.instruction: Continue practicing your strumming pattern with chord transitions.

tasks.title: Learn G Major Chord
tasks.instruction: Add the G major chord to your repertoire.

tasks.title: Strumming with G Major
tasks.instruction: Practice strumming with G major included.

tasks.title: Review Chords
tasks.instruction: Review all chords learned so far.

tasks.title: Play Along
tasks.instruction: Find a simple song that uses the chords you've learned and play along.

tasks.title: Learn C Major Chord
tasks.instruction: Add the C major chord to your practice.

tasks.title: Strumming Practice
tasks.instruction: Practice strumming with C major included.

tasks.title: Chord Progressions
tasks.instruction: Practice common chord progressions using E, A, D, G, and C.

tasks.title: Strumming Variations
tasks.instruction: Experiment with different strumming patterns.

tasks.title: Learn F Major Chord
tasks.instruction: Introduce the F major chord into your practice.

tasks.title: Strumming with F Major
tasks.instruction: Practice strumming with F major included.

tasks.title: Practice Chord Transitions
tasks.instruction: Focus on transitioning between all chords smoothly.

tasks.title: Play a Simple Song
tasks.instruction: Choose a song that uses the chords you've learned and practice it.

tasks.title: Learn a New Song
tasks.instruction: Pick another simple song and learn it using the chords you know.

tasks.title: Strumming Practice
tasks.instruction: Practice strumming along with the new song.

tasks.title: Introduction to Fingerpicking
tasks.instruction: Learn basic fingerpicking patterns.

tasks.title: Practice Fingerpicking
tasks.instruction: Practice fingerpicking on open strings.

tasks.title: Fingerpicking with Chords
tasks.instruction: Practice fingerpicking while playing E minor and E major.

tasks.title: Combine Techniques
tasks.instruction: Try combining strumming and fingerpicking in your practice.

tasks.title: Learn a New Fingerpicking Pattern
tasks.instruction: Introduce a new fingerpicking pattern.

tasks.title: Practice with Chords
tasks.instruction: Practice the new pattern with chords you've learned.

tasks.title: Learn a New Song with Fingerpicking
tasks.instruction: Choose a simple song that uses fingerpicking.

tasks.title: Play Along
tasks.instruction: Practice playing along with the song.

tasks.title: Review All Techniques
tasks.instruction: Review strumming and fingerpicking techniques.

tasks.title: Play a Song
tasks.instruction: Choose a song that incorporates both techniques and practice it.

tasks.title: Learn Barre Chords
tasks.instruction: Start learning the concept of barre chords.

tasks.title: Practice F Major Barre
tasks.instruction: Practice playing the F major chord as a barre chord.

tasks.title: Practice Barre Chord Transitions
tasks.instruction: Practice transitioning between barre chords and open chords.

tasks.title: Learn a Song with Barre Chords
tasks.instruction: Choose a song that uses barre chords and practice it.

tasks.title: Learn a New Song
tasks.instruction: Pick a song that incorporates both open and barre chords.

tasks.title: Play Along
tasks.instruction: Practice playing along with the song.

tasks.title: Review Songs Learned
tasks.instruction: Go through all songs you've learned and play them.

tasks.title: Focus on Weak Areas
tasks.instruction: Identify and practice areas where you struggle.

tasks.title: Learn a New Technique
tasks.instruction: Explore hammer-ons and pull-offs.

tasks.title: Practice Technique
tasks.instruction: Incorporate hammer-ons and pull-offs into your practice.

tasks.title: Learn a New Song with Techniques
tasks.instruction: Choose a song that uses hammer-ons and pull-offs.

tasks.title: Play Along
tasks.instruction: Practice playing along with the song.

tasks.title: Review Fingerpicking Patterns
tasks.instruction: Go through all fingerpicking patterns learned.

tasks.title: Combine Patterns
tasks.instruction: Experiment with combining different fingerpicking patterns.

tasks.title: Learn a New Song with Fingerpicking
tasks.instruction: Choose a more complex song that uses fingerpicking.

tasks.title: Play Along
tasks.instruction: Practice playing along with the song.

tasks.title: Explore New Genres
tasks.instruction: Listen to different genres and pick a style you want to learn.

tasks.title: Practice Style
tasks.instruction: Start practicing techniques from the chosen genre.

tasks.title: Learn a New Song in Chosen Genre
tasks.instruction: Pick a song from the genre you chose and learn it.

tasks.title: Play Along
tasks.instruction: Practice playing along with the song.

tasks.title: Review All Techniques
tasks.instruction: Review all techniques learned throughout the month.

tasks.title: Play a Medley
tasks.instruction: Create a medley of songs you've learned.

tasks.title: Record Yourself
tasks.instruction: Record yourself playing a song or medley.

tasks.title: Self-Review
tasks.instruction: Listen to your recording and note areas for improvement.

tasks.title: Set Future Goals
tasks.instruction: Reflect on your progress and set new goals for the next month.

tasks.title: Celebrate Your Progress
tasks.instruction: Play your favorite song and enjoy your progress!
